body.name: Happy Baby Organics Infant Formula, Milk Based Powder with Iron Stage 1, 21 Ounce (Pack of 1) packaging may vary

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: Modeled After Breast Milk & made with carefully sourced premium ingredients, this formula is made with organic lactose the principal carbohydrate found in breast milk. Our formula provides key vitamins and minerals that are found naturally in breast milk

With 4X More Prebiotics than most other organic infant formula, our formula delivers 2 prebiotics, GOS & FOS, Fibers that mimic the function of prebiotics found naturally in breast milk, which promote healthy gut bacteria in infants. No corn syrup solids. No carrageenan

Happy Baby: We provide organic, delicious options for your baby's nutritional journey; Happy Baby offers baby food pouches, organic cereals, teething wafers, baby snacks and more made for your little one

Happy Family Organics: We are on a mission to change the trajectory of children's health through nutrition; We provide age and stage appropriate premium organic food products for baby, tot, kid, and mama
Our Happy Promise: All products are certified USDA organic, made with non-GMO ingredients grown without the use of toxic persistent pesticides and in packaging made without BPA, BPS, or phthalates
body.description: Happy Baby Organic Infant Formula Milk Based Powder with Iron Stage 1, 21 Ounce (Packaging May Vary).

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,772 in Baby (See Top 100 in Baby) #18 in Powder Baby Formula #5,928 in Climate Pledge Friendly: Health and Household

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Complete nutrition with Lactose Lactose is the #1 component in breast milk, which is why it's #1 in our formula, too. Complete nutrition with Expert-recommended DHA Also found in breast milk, we include DHA to help support brain and eye development. Complete nutrition with Our GOS & FOS Helps promote softer stools, closer to breastfed infants’**. Next page 1 Lactose 2 Expert-recommended DHA 3 Dual Prebiotics

What’s the Difference Between Our Formulas? Stage 1: 0–12 months Stage 1 Sensitive: 0–12 months Stage 2: 6–12 months At-a-glance: Specially formulated to provide complete nutrition for the first year of life At-a-glance: Reduced lactose for sensitive bellies; complete nutrition for baby’s first year At-a-glance: Tailored to little ones’ development starting at 6 months Key ingredients: Made with organic lactose, prebiotics, and key vitamins & minerals. Key ingredients: Made with 75% reduced lactose for babies experiencing fussiness & gas. Key ingredients: Higher levels of key nutrients including calcium, choline, and iron.

Happy Baby Infant Formula Mixing Instructions Step 1 Wash hands and surfaces. Pour desired amount of warm water (approximately 100°F/40°C) into a clean bottle. Step 2 Add powder to water in bottle. (See Feeding Chart on back of canister.) Step 3 Cap bottle and shake well until powder is dissolved. Step 4 Feed immediately and discard used formula within 1 hour.

How many bottles can I make from one 21oz tub? You can prepare around 18–19 8-oz bottles with our 21oz tubs. How long does Happy Baby formula last? Please refer to the Use By date on the bottom of each formula tub. Once the tub has been opened, formula can be used for one month. We do not recommend using the formula after 30 days of opening. Can I prepare a bottle and store in the refrigerator? Yes, you can prepare formula in advance. Make sure to store prepared formula in the refrigerator and use it within 24 hours. Do not store any leftover formula that you have already fed to baby. What’s the best water temperature for mixing? We suggest preparing our formula with warm water (approximately 100F, or 40C). This temperature, which is just above body temp, will help to dissolve the formula properly. If the water is too cool, it will not mix properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our baby loves this formula. We decided to do a subscription to make life a little easier and it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As a Grandmother you want the best
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter was born on 11/8 at 6lb 13 oz and as of today 12/20 is 10 lbs 8 oz. She was initially breast fed but after my daughter wasnt producing enough she added this formula and then went strictly to formula and she has done so well on this formula. When I was researching formula for my daughter to choose. This brand was a stand out for me and I am so happy my granddaughter is thriving on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently started using Happy Baby Organics Infant Formula for my baby, and it has been a fantastic choice. This milk-based powder with iron, Stage 1 formula, comes in a 21-ounce container (Pack of 1), although the packaging may vary.One of the things that immediately stood out to me about this formula is its commitment to organic ingredients. It's reassuring to know that I'm providing my baby with a product that prioritizes high-quality, non-GMO, and organic ingredients. The fact that it includes iron is also crucial for a baby's development.Preparing the formula is straightforward, and it dissolves easily in warm water without clumping. My baby took to it smoothly, and it seems gentle on their sensitive tummy, which is a big relief for any parent.The packaging may vary, but the container I received was easy to open and reseal, keeping the formula fresh between feedings. Plus, the clear measurement markings on the container make it simple to ensure I'm preparing the right amount.As a parent, I appreciate that Happy Baby Organics values sustainability and eco-friendly practices in their production. Knowing that the brand cares about the environment as much as it does about the quality of its formula is a big plus for me.Overall, Happy Baby Organics Infant Formula has been a wonderful choice for my baby's nutrition. Its commitment to organic ingredients, ease of preparation, and baby-friendly qualities make it a product I would confidently recommend to other parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy Baby Formula
reviews.reviewText: Our little one was so fussy before we switched to happy baby. Definitely recommend if you have a fussy baby.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best formula ever
reviews.reviewText: I never had to use formula with my first son and I didn’t have to start using it until my daughter was six months old and I really panicked. We went through a lot of issues and she wasn’t feeling good for quite a while and then I randomly search this on Amazon it’s been the best thing ever since she’s never had an issue since we’ve been using it which is been five months now and I’m so happy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars one of my favorite formulas
reviews.reviewText: My baby did great with this formula and seemed to be one of the better organic options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Daughter does well with this formula
reviews.reviewText: My 4 month old has been on this formula since she was about 1 month old. I have found she handles this formula really well. We were on a couple generic formulas before settling on this one and she digests this one better and has had less spit up. I gave it 4 out of 5 stars because it does get really frothy/bubbling when you mix it. I also wish it came in a bigger canister and not just the 21oz size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2017
reviews.reviewText: Not being able to breast feed, I set out to find the right formula for my baby and have been through several formulas from the top brands, probably too many, and none of them have completely worked for my baby. One formula would help her be regular and wouldn’t cause any gas, but would aggravate her GERD, while abother would help her GERD, but cause painful gas. Both situations led to hours of crying and in need of constant soothing. I am the only one who stays up with her at night, so six weeks of little sleep and constant crying has been heartbreaking, beyond exhausting, and overwhelming. Desperate, I began researching formula ingredients and started to think that maybe corn ingredients were upsetting her belly and GERD. Also, I wanted to make sure she was getting safe, quality food, so I began looking into organic formulas and came across this one. I vowed to change her formula one last time, and if it didn’t work, we would just have to settle until she outgrew her GERD and belly issues. The first time I gave her a bottle of this formula, she did not squirm or pull back in pain, like she did with other formulas, and for the first time, she actually loved the taste! She gulped it down no problem. I waited, anticipating some kind of bad reaction, but no abnormal gas or spit up ever came. Then, a miracle happened, she took a two and half hour nap for the first time in her life! She has never slept longer than half an hour! That night, she was able to fall asleep on her own, again, for the first time in her life! I’m so happy to have found something that she can eat without any discomfort, and I’m really happy over the impressive ingredients list. I feel confident feeding this formula to my baby.The formula, itself is fluffy before mixing, and has a good consistency after mixing. Not too thick, not too thin. Not foamy. The container is easy to open and has a slot for the scoop to go in, so you don’t have to dig through the formula to retrieve it. The smell isn’t bad. The color of the formula looks similar to that of breast milk. The only issue is that I either have to order this formula online or drive an hour to the nearest Target to purchase this formula. I wish more vendors sold it!This formula has completely changed my baby! Thank you SO much, Happy Family! We both can look forward to feedings now!
